articles.title: Sri Lanka protest movement reaches 100 days - Times of India
articles.description: South Asia News: COLOMBO: Sri Lanka's protest movement reached its 100th day on Sunday, having forced one president from office and now turning its sights on his succe.
articles.content: Lanka needs our sympathy, not our contemptGetting into bed with China may have proved to be Sri Lankas undoing. Now, we have a chance to lend a helping hand
